titleInfo.title: D.A. Nunn in Brownsville, TN to Gen. John Eaton, Jr. in Nashville, TN

subject.topic: Reconstruction and the freedmen: appearance of hitherto undocumented people in legal records; the fastening of sharecropping on the countryside.

mods.note: Claims that there is nothing more to be said on an unspecified matter. Expresses the belief that the writer can carry the county by a great majority if General Smith will give him a clear field and if the governor is empowered to use the militia during the election.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
